title: Julius Caesar
creator_credit: Joseph L Mankiewicz, John Houseman and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
brief_description: Based on William Shakespeare’s play, the film is an intense, passionate drama about conspiracy, murder and the use and abuse of power in Ancient Rome. The cast includes: Marlon Brando, James Mason, Deborah Kerr, John Gielgud and Greer Garson.
